  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FinishedSpanHandler Deprecated.
    Since 5.12 use SpanHandler.end(TraceContext, MutableSpan, Cause) with SpanHandler.Cause.FINISHED
    MutableSpan
    This represents a span except for its TraceContext.
    MutableSpanBytesEncoder
    Similar to zipkin2.MutableSpan.SpanBytesEncoder except no Zipkin dependency.
    SpanHandler
    This tracks one recording of a TraceContext.
